ai-ja374:1.1_0: “For one who undertakes and follows the goods,
ai-ja374:2.3_0: For I’ve taught you the Dhamma
ai-ja374:2.4_0: I’m your daughter to stay too.”
ai-ja374:3.1_0: “The sacred flame of a grove of golden shower,
ai-ja374:5.4_0: it seems to you like this!
ai-ja374:6.2_0: just as you say to India.
ai-ja374:6.3_0: But I couldn’t go to the place
ai-ja374:6.4_0: I’ll stay in the home of the lay life.”
ai-ja374:7.2_0: from the jungle they carry it back.
ai-ja374:7.3_0: Now that you do the bad
ai-ja374:8.1_0: The Shorter Discourse on the fourth born.
